name: Arno
appearance: Broad-shouldered, kiln-scarred forearms, beard dusted with salt and ash; wears a blue-row master’s sash and smoked-glass eye-guard on a chain.
character: Exacting guildmaster who finds beauty in precision; civic-minded but ferocious about marks and measures; values contracts over charisma.
talents: feels heat shifts in a room like a draft
anticipates how glass will cool and stress
dreams: Lock down the Siltglass Flats with chartered wardens
secrets: Approved a quiet blend of cheaper flats-silt in blue-row wares to undercut foreign glass
Keeps a sealed ledger of inspectors who take gifts
Suspects a comptroller’s skim at the arsenal but won’t expose it without leverage
